words_with_descriptions.hoops: A colloquial term for basketball, referring to the game or the baskets themselves.
words_with_descriptions.dodge: A fast movement to avoid a hit or throw, often used in dodgeball.
words_with_descriptions.race: A competition of speed, in which participants try to finish a set course in the shortest time possible.
words_with_descriptions.dive: The act of jumping into water head-first, also a technique in football to simulate being fouled.
words_with_descriptions.grip: The way in which a player holds a sports equipment, such as a racket, bat, or club.
words_with_descriptions.curl: A sport in which players slide stones on a sheet of ice towards a target area.
words_with_descriptions.punch: A striking blow with the fist, commonly used in boxing.
words_with_descriptions.foul: An unfair or illegal sports action that breaks the rules of the game.
words_with_descriptions.swing: The act of moving an object in a curved path, typically used in golf or baseball to hit a ball.
